content.raw:
Thanks! ~~I just found out I need to change all the image links because they won’t render once built with the syntax they’re in now.~~ \(this doesn’t apply here, only for library tutorials\)

Besides that I’ll update all the pictures since component inspector is now loaded with shapes.sdf, and add a section about component inspector to “Manipulating Models”.

So I might need one more pass soon :\)
content.html:
Thanks! I just found out I need to change all the image links because they won’t render once built with the syntax they’re in now. (this doesn’t apply here, only for library tutorials)

Besides that I’ll update all the pictures since component inspector is now loaded with shapes.sdf, and add a section about component inspector to “Manipulating Models”.

So I might need one more pass soon :)
